title: Bringing Assassin Champions to the Next Level (Champion Idea)
body: So after the reveal of the next champion Kindred I thought it would be time to talk about the "next champion" or any champions that will be made in the future. I had this really cool idea for a champion a few weeks back that really takes assassins to "the next level" (Take a look at his ultimate) so I thought I would share it to the community and Riot to see what they think and maybe give them a thought on introducing new unique abilities (Since Kindreds ultimate is far from original) This was my first time attempting to construct a champion so bare with it, here it is : (http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/0BEswHF9-champion-idea)

replies.body: kfitz45 nice concept excpet them passive should be a percent of the enemy's hp and his ult should be slightly different, it would also be nice if you would give a few scales to his atttacks/abilities for riot to change, but overall great champion, hope to see it soon, also, i would probably change the ult a bit :D gl
